    • Method Detail

      • setTask

        public void setTask(Task task)
        Initializes the cell of the task in the RecyclerView using the task param that was passed. It initializes the title, the subtitle, the date and time when the task was created, the color, the image and the rating if it's a TimeTask then it initializes the date and time when the reminder was set and if it's a LocationTask then it initializes the address picked
        Parameters:
        task - The task passed for the cell
